items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the top! TTS ivory color.
items.body: I probably could have sized up to have the fit like the model, but I love this top. I’m busty and didn’t feel like I was showing off or slipping out. The texture of the knit feels almost like a felted wool. I wore it on a warm day and was admittedly hot, but on a cool day this would be lovely!! The style is spot on, looked great with boot cut jeans. The color is a nice light ivory, not whited not cream. I can easily dress this up with a silk skirt for an occasion (i.e. holidays) or dress pants for work, or more casual with jeans. Definitely more of a fall/winter/early spring staple. Even though I feel I could have sized up, the recommended size was spot on. By the way, the flared sleeves are long but look great! Read more
items.author: S. A. Stevens

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves are way too long!
items.body: Sleeves are way to long! Read more
items.author: Susie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cozy but with a few issues
items.body: This cardigan is very soft and cozy, and the V-neck wrap design is cute. The knit has a nice, chunky feel that's great for casual wear. However, the fit isn't quite what I expected; it feels a bit loose in some areas and the tie can be a bit awkward. It's a decent sweater for the price, but not perfect. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and warm but short on the waist.
items.body: Cute and warm but i wish it were a little longer than it is for the taller people. Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: So cozy and warm Read more
items.author: Svitlana

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Way too short
items.body: I ended up returning this as it was very short, cut very low in the bust and the sleeves were super long. It would be perfect for someone going to ballet class. Read more
items.author: Stephanie R

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not soft
items.body: Did not like the material at all. Not comfortable Read more
items.author: Goober106

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Different color = different material
items.body: White color material is different from gray color - white is a thicker sweater material- gray is breathable and lightweight Read more
items.author: Imelda

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Chocolate Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
